description:
Medma Infomatix Private Limited is one of the fastest growing IT company in the region which provides quality web & mobile solutions. We have completed hundreds of projects for our clients in USA, UK, AUSTRALIA, CANADA, SWEDEN, ITALY, DENMARK, FIJI, THAILAND, MAURITIUS, AUSTRIA, SWITZERLAND and in many other parts of the world. We have talented brains from premier institutes with sufficient practical experience in the industry.
Each professional has certain expertise in his specific area, helping him to serve the client in a better way. Be it Cloud apps, Mobile apps, Social Games, or Big Data applications, Medma Infomatix can take care of it all with professional finesse and competence. We place great emphasis on customer's requirement and try to give them quality services. Our aim is to achieve total customer delight by superseding the customer's expectations.
